website_summaries.verdict: This is the top-of-the-line Samsung Galaxy Tablet and a must-have for artists hoping to take their work to the next level.
pros: The S Pen adds a level of tactile control and traditional technique to an ultra-high-tech tool
The AMOLED display is bright and crisp
With a massive 256GB of storage, you'll have plenty of room to save your masterpieces
cons: Although this model is quite expensive, you get what you pay for
There is not much to be disappointed about with this model if you're looking for a highly functional and visually pleasing tablet for work or play

customer_reviews.title: Think about it
customer_reviews.text: I have owned numerous Samsung products and other brand tablets. When I recieved mine I discovered you can't set the homes screen to landscape! WTF Plus it is heavier than my Tab S3. It doesn't have the fingerprint reader like my S3. Maybe this isn't an issue for you but having to use a utility to get landscape in the home screen is a deal breaker for me. And my S3 is buffering during web streaming. Real bummer for me
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as silk with PLENTY of memory (for a change).
customer_reviews.text: This tablet just works REALLY well and has plenty of memory. If you were like us you kept running out of room from too many things on the tablet. With 256GB, that won't be an issue for a long time and the price seemed well in line for that much memory. So many apps had issues when they were moved to an SD card and when they updated they jumped back to internal memory anyway, that I was hoping for a tablet that had enough memory to handle our heavy usage. This is a really good one!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Up graded from a Tab S2, was hesitant because of the price but I'm glad I did. One of the things I really like is the blue light filter, much easier on my old eyes. This tablet is expensive but I think worth it. One tip I have is download Chrome Beta from Play Store, this solves the problem of not being able to type in some search boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Eva 81

customer_reviews.title: USED NOT NEW
customer_reviews.text: The tablet came opened already it had smudges and fingerprints on the screen as if someone used it the poor attempt that was made to seal the box back again was horrible it looked like someone just put scotch tape and called it a day
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice device but isn't worth.
customer_reviews.text: The charging is pretty slow, some games dont run smooth when they should, and web browser crashes. But its a nice device i enjoyed using the pen. But i would wait for a huge drop in price or until all bugs are fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Amazon knowingly sells defective products.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon knowing sent me a defective product saying it was new and nothing about a pixel being out on the screen. I was suspicious of the very low price (700 including the keyboard case) for this particular model(not the black), but I bit. A-holes. Normally this would have been much more expensive. Buy from Amazon and this may(and probably will happen to you). Should have made it clear it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: NAMBA

customer_reviews.title: doesn't pick up wifi
customer_reviews.text: I bought it so I didn't have to bring my laptop to school seeing it is so heavy, but I brought it to school and it did not serve the purpose because it would not allow for me sign on to my wifi, I used hotspot also did not work. The information given was wifi use so if it says that I expect for it to allow me to use wifi, and then when I am trying to return it just 3 days past the "return deadline" the seller tells me its too late and their hands are tied. unfair unfair unfair and unreliable
customer_reviews.author: Chauvelle Latty

customer_reviews.title: Poor wifi :(
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a terrific tablet, but the unit I got had a really unstable wifi connection: - It connects, says internet is unavailable, disconnects and starts again, every few seconds. - Once in a while the connection will be made successfully, but will drop after 1-2 minutes of use. The lack of stable internet turns it pretty much into an expensive brick
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Tab S4 is a nice
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an Android tablet this is a good buy. In out family we have a Tab S2,S4 and S6. Al work great and believe it or not all work almost the same and just as fast as the other, with the S2 just a tad slower. The S4 speed vs. S6 are pretty much the same. Screen quality is same. Both are equally the same to use but the S-pen on the S6 needs to be charged and controls other features which we don't use. For the Money the Tab S4 would be my top choice over all Samsung tab s series tablet right now.
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Wait until Samsung fixes tablet before buying
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few weeks and, for the most part, like it but it's got one big bug, my accounts won't sync properly, if at all. This mostly affects my Google account. Even when I force a sync nothing happens. If I update my calendar or a contact on my phone, nothing changes on my tablet. Clearing the cache and rebooting is no help. That really sucks. Tried Samsung support and they were no help at all. In fact, they caused more problems than help. Had to reset the tablet after their "help".
customer_reviews.author: MikeBTP

customer_reviews.title: Beware the hassles of no fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: No fingerprint reader on their flagship product, inexcusable! Regret buying this as I'm constantly having to type in passwords instead of just using my fingerprint.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this tablet because I spent about $500 on an S2 9.7'' about 1.5 years ago. But I wanted the extra screen space and better sound. What I didn't realize is how much faster and smoother everything is on this tablet. My TV will be soon be gone, not to mention my PC. This thing does it all - IMO a bargain considering the punch it packs. (The price seems to fluctuate quite a bit - watch it for a bit and time it right to save money.)
customer_reviews.author: Stinkfoot

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it in the Family
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Samsung devices going on 7 years now and I must say, Samsung's design team certainly outdid themselves with the Tab S4. It's a beast of a machine. Great sound quality, seamless interface, killer battery life ( we're talking DAYS of casual use on one charge) and makes multitasking a breeze. DeX Mode with the keyboard is great when you still need that laptop performance, and standard tablet handles everything else with complete ease. Splurge for the name brand cases too, for the full experience. Nothing else compares.
customer_reviews.author: Overton Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line Tablet - Very Pricey
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a top of the line Android tablet, this is the ticket. It's sleek, powerful, and runs very well. However, the price tag is a huge turn off for many. Despite the cost, if you are looking for a top of the line android tablet, this is the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Screen had problems right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I waited so long for this product only to have it with half the screen working. You can't imagine how upset and disappointed I am
customer_reviews.author: Ja-Reyne Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best Around. Tried and true.
customer_reviews.text: More than I could've hoped. Admittedly, it's been a bit since I purchased a tablet. Mainly, the lack of purchase was due to poor sound quality, or poor visual quality. This tablet exceeds my expectations in both categories. The ease of setup and syncing with my current devices was, and continues to be, seemless. I'm not a fan of writing reviews, but in this case, I've come to love, and enjoy, what I feel is the least constrained and most reliable tablet on the market. Prove me otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Lola and Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when buying these items.
customer_reviews.text: I had made this purchase and item had to be returned to be replaced because of an accident with the carrier.apon exchanging my item when my item was delivered it had no plastic on it and checking after to see how it works the item keeps shorting of .I am very disappointed.but did not bother returning the item because that's a lot of drama by itself .in a nutshell my item looked as it was used or refurbished. Just my luck.and I purchased this item as new.
customer_reviews.author: Carl C.

customer_reviews.title: The file system sucks
customer_reviews.text: I try to transfair files to it and id cuts half way. This is unaccepticble by the price I used diddfrent cables and it still does the same thing
customer_reviews.author: Bolivar Morales

customer_reviews.title: Constantly freezes up, its a piece of junk, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several Samsung tablets. This one is the biggest piece of junk I have ever owned. It constantly freezes up and has to be rebooted everyday. I can't take it anymore! It's going in the trash. Going back to a Google pixel.
customer_reviews.author: Emily N

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It's too complicated. A regular stylus can be used with it, and if you don't need a Lot of Samsung proprietary functions that demands exclusive commitment: buy the model without and save 100s of dollars. I had an nVidia Shield Tablet, which was intuitive to use. This is not. The only advantage it has, is the resolution. It has a very nice screen. I also bought the keyboard, which works nicely, with it, but (a) it's very small and my knuckles often hit the screen when typing and (b) it's not backlit - for this amount of $$s, not backlighting the keyboard is true sleaze
customer_reviews.author: blazintommyd

customer_reviews.title: Quick and powerful, with a beautiful screen
customer_reviews.text: Loving this tablet so far. I'm a student in commercial flight school and needed a larger screen for IFR training. I upgraded from the Samsung Tab A 8" to this and it's obviously much faster but the larger screen size has unlocked features in Garmin Pilot that I wish I had all along. This tablet also has GPS which is a must for me. Battery life should never be an issue for me but if something comes up I'll be sure to update this review. Once I get used to using the S-Pen I shouldn't need pens/paper in the cockpit anymore, which will be nice.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crawmer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that I would regret not getting the tablet with data on it so I can swap my SIM into it... but I have not regretted it to this point. I chose to have more on board storage instead, and I just tether my wifi from my phone to connect the tablet. Works great. Very fast table response, and the battery life has been fantastic... only needing to charge it every few days with daily use (5+ hrs a day streaming movies, or remoting in to my large desktop). You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Chovis38

customer_reviews.title: Apple sheep turned Samsung Lover!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all Apple, Microsoft and Samsung tablets for a month and I always end up keeping the Samsung tablet. The hardware is just top notch, premium and solid stuff. Sound is superb with Dolby Atmos feature. Two taps on the screen to wake it up. Speed of light processing. I use split screen all the time.
customer_reviews.author: WillPower

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Brand for Tablets
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Samsung Tab tablet. I loved the first, but needed one with a stylus. This one has it and it works beautifully. The screen is very sensitive to the touch of the stylus but not so much that it makes it hard to use. The battery life on this tablet will last me about two days with consistent use. It's a little heavier than my first tablet (Samsung Tab S2 9.7") but it's also faster and more responsive. If you've ever had a Samsung Galaxy phone, this is much like owning a very large version of one.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: The Best - Pay the Extra, worth every nickle!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Android devices, including my 1st and last iPad and there is nothing even close to this Tablet. With it's S-Pen for design (+ more), DEX sub-operating system, it's super+ AMOLED (2560x1600) display with blue light filter (setting) rich Blacks in Dark Mode, Android Pie (9) along with One UI, Qualcomm Snapdragon 835 processor (very fast), 7300 mAh battery (10 hrs easy), Storage: 64/256 GB (expandable up to 400 GB), Memory: 4 GB Bixby, Dolby Atmos with 4 speakers, tough shiny glass display with extraordinary color presentation, very easy to wipe clean, great engineering, construction, + ya da, ya da, ya da...
customer_reviews.author: Glockman

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet, Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is amazing. It conserves battery very well when the screen is off. I bought it to replace a (badly) aging Nvidia Shield . I tried using Linux on DeX as well since I'm a developer. While it runs ok, i came across all sorts of limitations and incompatibilities. A simple example is being unable to run a normal secure version of Chrome. DeX itself is pretty nice. To summarize: Great as a tablet, not quite there yet as a laptop replacement (for developers). Still highly recommended. Also, still includes the (slowly becoming) elusive headphone jack... which is basic IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: BeastInside

customer_reviews.title: Absurd flaw for a pretended PC experience
customer_reviews.text: It just does not keep original timestamps when copying or synchronizing files, what turns it into a sort of encased gadget with a shipwrecked DEX. For heavy users, you must add a card reader and enjoy removing and returning the SD card from and to its slot each time you need to update or backup your work. For unsophisticated tasks, as transferring photos, you need a timestamp changer that brings EXIF data up. I was told that with the Oreo version this issue was solved, but it does not. Tablet plus book cover keyboard plus a good screen protector plus a 400 Gb SD card means close to one thousand dollars; too much indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Ares Bogliacino Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and display
customer_reviews.text: I love it as far as the sound and display which are awesome. The Samsung store did not have the app for Optimum and I had to go to Google play store.Unfortunately the app doesn't work as well as it did on my old iPad. Also the Facebook app doesn't seem to work well on the Galaxy tab. I find I have to flip the pad in order to see the page in a normal view not a zoomed in view.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet but the battery life is only 3 or 4 hours.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tablet but the battery life is only 3 or 4 hours. I expected the battery life to be shorter than specified. The manufacturers always seem exaggerate the battery life. Maybe they test it with absolutly nothing running so it lasts a long time. But this is rediculous. Less than half the battery life. Also there are times the touchscreen quits and nothing can be operated. Thankfully this is rare. I really don't know if its the tablet hardware or the Android operating system that causes the freeze up. It's easy to fix. Just turn the tablet off and on again. Otherwise, this is an awesome tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung features mess up experience
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Google Store tablets and phones. However, they no longer offer a large tablet so I got this. It is high quality but I find navigating around the Samsung features annoying and confusing. For example, there is a Samsung Internet. Why? Just let me use Chrome. Worse, I cannot see how to.make Chrome the default browser and am not sure how to erase Samsung Internet history. So I feel there is less privacy. Unhappy with a lovely piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: improved battery life first Tab S
customer_reviews.text: I had Tab S, and finally battery gave up, bat replacements didn't work, so I decided to go S4. In comparison, S5 and S6 forego headphone jack, S4 was on sale too. Easy choice, no regrets, battery life is around 8 hours, up from Tab S 4 hours. Tablet is heavier because of that. Cameras r same as Tab S, so very good for webchat, Skype, WhatsApp, Zoom etc.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest_Lou

customer_reviews.title: Dark scenes are too Dark :/
customer_reviews.text: Dark scenes are difficult to see in movies and in online videos. The bright scenes look amazing though. Sigh!! Adjusting the display mode won't fix it.
customer_reviews.author: ArmanCTZ

customer_reviews.title: Just a little powerful wonder.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the general feeling from other users, but for me, it fits every single day need and use...with the 400Gb added its versatility increases far beyond my first impression. We can think of other things that could be included, but for me is not a big deal...The battery life is acceptable, great performance, and reliability as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Wong-Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I fisrt got a Galaxy Book because someone told me it ran android apps but not true its Microsoft so only apps Microsoft allows but dont get me wrong it was a good product just not what I was looking for .. so I returned it and ordered a Galaxy S4 tablet and it is Exactly what I was looking for its runs all my apps that my note9 does and couldn't be happier with this tablet
customer_reviews.author: anita Perez

customer_reviews.title: As a tablet it is wonderful, as a computer not so hot.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for months and using it as a tablet, it works well. No real issues except apps sometimes treat it as a phone. So you switch over to computer mode, several issues: The only major issue and it is a deal breaker for me, keyboard only occasionally works. Defeats the purpose of the whole purchase if it tries to make me use the screen keyboard and not the actual keyboard. No way I can figure out how to get around the screen keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Alabamagirl71

customer_reviews.title: Works great but very expensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my Tab S2 that did not have a S pen. This S pen definitively is very handy and precise. I use the tablet a lot for note taking and for this it is great. DeX mode make it look more like a laptop and with a bluetooth keayboard with mouse pad and working from the clould, it is close to laptop experience. Memory capacity is low, also for the high price paid. Display is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Willem

customer_reviews.title: Faulty maybe?
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the graphics for some games , idk if it was a faulty tablet that I received or what but didnt see the performance in games. The dex feature is great tho, would like to order another to give it a chance ,maybe in the future.
customer_reviews.author: DOPEST

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than ipad
customer_reviews.text: I bought the s4 and the iPad pro 11" at the same time, knowing I was not going to keep both. My last tablet was a Galaxy tab s, so I guess I had a predilection towards the s4, and I ended up returning the iPad pro. I just find the s4 much easier to use. If I had any complaint, it would be that I do not like any of the cases for the s4. I really like it a lot though, I use it more than my laptop now.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Boy

customer_reviews.title: Too much Samsung software!
customer_reviews.text: This might be a good product for someone who is immune to bundled software, but I returned the product due to frustration with that. And then there was the 'Help' button that when pressed produced a message in about 100 different languages that basically said that the 'Help' button doesn't work. I bought a Lenovo tablet instead; sorry, this is not for me...
customer_reviews.author: Al V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Simple as that. Easy to use with the Samsung cover that includes the keyboard. It easily replaces bringing a laptop when I travel. One can plug in an actual keyboard too in order to be more comfortable working with it. The only downside is it doesn't have all the same functionalities as a normal computer. But is comes as a close second, which I would be happy to deal with since I travel a lot and hate lugging my laptop around. With this I could actually travel light and be happy with what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 other Samsung tablets and somehow they keep getting better! I bought with 256 gb memory. What I really loved is that there is a sync feature which moved all of my content from my Samsung Tab S2 over to the S4. I also bought the keyboard cover with hopes that a small tablet like this can be used to do some work and reading on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: las911

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Owned 6 months. The screen quality is what I like the most. I watch baseball and hockey on here and its stunning, absolutely stunning. And it really comes in handy when my laptop goes kaputs. Battery seems to last for some time. Don't have anything else to say really just had to say how much I love the quality of the screen. One thing that I worry about, and this doesn't effect me directly, this cost more now than 6 months ago. More Amazon price gouching??
customer_reviews.author: Sketch

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was purchased to replace my old Samsung note A series with stylus. Pros and cons: speed, unit boots up fast when you turn on and surfing the web. Battery, charges fast, only holds a day during heavy use. Stylus, still up in the air about the stylus, like or dislike. I'm an avid user of the note series enjoying the slim stylus, the feel of the new stylus takes some time to get adjusted to. It's all around bigger and no storage location within the tablet, storage area is in the case. Overall, I love Samsung only change would be to have storage of the stylus located within the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Glad I waited so long.
customer_reviews.text: I had the Samsung Tab S10.5 original series for so long I didn't upgrade due to the 4:3 screens of the Tab S2 and S3. I'm glad I waited for this 16:10 screen, as watching stuff on these screen ratio types is so much better than have wide black bars on the top and bottom of the screen when the device is held or placed in landscape mode..
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Generally works well
customer_reviews.text: Frequently looses its internet connection and need to turn off wifi, then back on and reconnect
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product, just to have to send it back, not because anything was wrong but because my husband surprised me with the same product. I love this tablet and everything it's able to do. Even bought an adapter for the charger port to take a USB flash drive and that works perfectly too
customer_reviews.author: Helen H.

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Samsung Galaxy Tab s4 today. I love it! The colors are vibrant on the screen. The S pen is easy to use. I also bought the Samsung Keyboard. The tablet connects nicely to it and has a nice grip so you don't have to worry about the tablet pulling loose. I am still learning what all I can do with the Samsung Galaxy Tab s4 but so far it's a great buy and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Utopiangirrl

customer_reviews.title: A Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I had an older TAB S that went out, and I needed to replace it. I love this tablet. It has gobs of memory -- I got the 256 GByte model. (at 16 GB the older one was always needing files to be deleted). It has the stylus, and ability to write with it, but I haven't ade much use of that, but it seems to work well. I use this every day to check email, pay biils, facebook etc. With the keyboard, I have keep up some financial spreadsheets and write letters.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet, but no fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: This device is powerful, fast, and works quite well. My only real gripe with it is the lack of a fingerprint reader. Seriously Samsung? C'mon!
customer_reviews.author: AzDayton

customer_reviews.title: Good improvement over the Tab S2.
customer_reviews.text: The screen quality is exceptional, 4K like. The speed is good for the tabs and 300bps WiFi speed makes internet connections snappy. Lots of YouTube connections can bring the 100% battery down to 20% in 6-7 hours. It is $100 cheaper at Best Buy, I need Amazon to match the price and send me a 2 $100 refunds for the 2 Tab S4s I bought before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: joesputers

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot to pay for something that sat in the box for nearly 6 months before I opened it. Now 6 months of use, games, emails, weather, FB, sitting at the kitchen table, I go to restart and it looks like the thing is possessed! It's flicking all color's, up, down and sideways. I'm trying to turn it off but it keeps flicking. This has happened twice so far. 🤬
customer_reviews.author: K.A.Talley

customer_reviews.title: It uses android OS- therefore it sucks
customer_reviews.text: If you are a student, do NOT get this. Dex mode is not full blown pc. OneNote in android sucks. Software limitation is just frustrating. For much cheaper you can get surface go. You can run multisim in surface go!
customer_reviews.author: truth seeker

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet Around
customer_reviews.text: Samsung Tablets are the best on the market I hightly recommend them. The new DEX feature basically turns your Tab into a laptop computer. Seller was prompt on shipping and curtious i highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mobius

customer_reviews.title: Replaces other computers.
customer_reviews.text: The Galay Tab S4 has an excellent touchscreen. I use it outdoors for mapping and photos. Battery life is very good getting+/- 24 hours between charges. I have experienced good performance. It is my "daily driver". I rarely use my laptop or desktop any more.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he loves it. Has a great screen, battery life, well worth spending the extra money. I also recommend getting the keyboard case which turns it into a mini laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Embeolda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet
customer_reviews.text: The screen is simply gorgeous and the Tab S4 runs fast. I really like it and it's a huge improvement over my old 10.1 2014 model. I gave the device 4 stars because it does not have a fingerprint reader and many apps do not recognize iris scanning.
customer_reviews.author: A. Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to more expensive apple products. I use my device daily for note-taking, drawing, accessing apps, and reading. I love how it comes with the S-Pen. Definitely worth every penny. The audio and video is great for watching YouTube videos or even streaming shows. I haven't played video games on this yet, so I cannot provide info on that. I've had this device for about two months now and have nothing but positive feedback to share.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S4 tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONE to buy. Did lots of research and watched reviews of this model--ALL said it is superior to other versions. A great buy for the cost. The extras are included as other versions do not have the pen, coloring option , etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jez

customer_reviews.title: Problem with the WiFi / Internet
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tablet until recently when the warranty expired (9 Months). Really loved this tablet but now it cannot connect with the Internet. A common problem when the WiFi is connected but he Internet is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Faustian Dark Sage

customer_reviews.title: Better as a tablet than pixel slate
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Does split screen great and the apps work well. Absolutely love the pen too!! I recommend. Tried the Google pixel slate and it was terrible as a tablet, this Samsung s4 is definitely a great tablet. This is replacing my Samsung 10.1 tm520?? One.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Happy user
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Samsung tablet and an upgrade from my last one. This tablet is so much faster and more responsive. I have not yet explored what it can do but even though I am very much a tech neophyte, I find it fairly easy to figure out. Great for reading and doing searches. For those of you who are more tech savvy, you will really enjoy this tablet even more than I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 264 gb love it
customer_reviews.text: I had the Samsung TAB A but ran out of storage...go figure! Love this tablet and can't believe how great the graphics and sound are on it...thought my TAB A was good but this is even better! I purchased the keyboard with it right away and am glad i did.
customer_reviews.author: amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: A really good tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of the cheaper tablets and they left a lot to be desired. So I bit the bullet and got this S4 and I love it. It is pricey, but in electronics I think you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tablet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Samsung dex and the desktop experience, but it really disappointed me. There are a lot of improvements needed for DeX mode: - music controls doesn't show on lock screen. - a lot of settings are not available, such as lock screen and other important settings. - full screen mode, so it can fit for games and other apps that doesn't fully support window view. - smart pen features, like translation.
customer_reviews.author: Amer

customer_reviews.title: ask more questions
customer_reviews.text: Confused, thought I already wrote this review, thought it was cellular and it was not, could have bought the same product from Verizon or AT&T with their wifi card. Too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Kaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Multifunctional Gift for Teens
customer_reviews.text: Gift for granddaughter. I already owned the same item and use mine all the time. Figured this would be a much better option than a one function drawing tablet. With this multifunctional Samsung tablet, she can draw as much as she desires plus do so much more with it. I'm writing this review right now on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love my tablet! It's the perfect size for reading, playing games, and navigating. I use it at home a little, but mainly when traveling. Handiest gadget!
customer_reviews.author: F. Gast

customer_reviews.title: Totally sold on this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I needed a tablet until I got one for Christmas, now I use it all the time. With the keyboard cover, it's practically a laptop for light writing tasks. I've even started drawing more with the AutoDesk Sketchbook app. I like it so much, I got one for the person who gave me mine.
customer_reviews.author: Killy23

customer_reviews.title: Great android tablet -- using it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Great AMOLED screen, thin and light. Powerful and quick for all my uses. Love the s-pen, I think the point is better this time as it's finer than in previous s-pens. Love that it has options for making it easier on my eyes, including blue shade, color inversion and grayscale. Pair this with an anti-glare screen protector and the samsung keyboard case and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Facial/Iris recognition to unlock device is very unreliable. S pen works sporadically.
customer_reviews.text: Face/iris scan to unlock device works sporadically and half of the times it won't work at all and I end up having to to manually type in the password, even after resetting the intelliscan multiple times. Also privacy concerns since I can't disable or cover the camera unless I want to manually write password to open the tablet. S pen will work sporadically and is unreliable even after replacing the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Artigj

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet with awesome display and overall performance
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. The tablet was $200 cheaper so I bought it right away. The Dex mode is awesome and really helpful. The display is quite amazing which is no surprise since it's coming from Samsung. I am happy with the overall experience of the tablet. I gave only 4 stars because it came without an earphone. I called Amazon twice and the only solution they had was to return the tablet and order a new one. I couldn't do that since I was traveling and didn't have the time to order a replacement. If it came with a earphone, I would give it 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Asim Regmi

customer_reviews.title: EXELLENT TABLET!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT TABLET!! The screen quality is superb!! This is a smaller version of my new S7+. Love the pen to write notes. The quad speakers are really nice. I wish there was more bass tones though. No headphone jack so you have to use a wireless connection.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P. - San Ramon, CA

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet bad charger..
customer_reviews.text: I just got this tablet today and I like it a lot, however the charger is defective. I had to use a different one to charge the tablet. You would that they'd test everything before sending it out.
customer_reviews.author: Retta Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. the quality is great and it's very fast. The pencil sensitivity is great for drawing and animation. Battery life varies obviously on apps being used but on a slow week I'll charge it 3 times. Heavy use maybe once a day.
customer_reviews.author: Nagol

customer_reviews.title: Hardware issue
customer_reviews.text: Here's another so-so review. Individually, this tablet is pretty good. Great screen, decent battery, etc. But, the power button on mine no longer presses...I mean, it doesn't move when pressed. I can no longer use it to reliably turn the tablet on or off. 600 bucks is a lot of money to spend on something that breaks 4 months outside the warranty window.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than an iPad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an iPad that was just too old and too slow. I use my tablet primarily for meetings and travel. I love the screen off notes when I'm in meetings, to jot down any and everything I need to remember. When I travel I love the ability to save movies onto a 128gb sd card and pop that in without having to worry about slowing down my tablet or running out of storage space. I'm sure it has way more capability than I use it for, but it certainly meets my fairly pedestrian needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I payed so much money for this and 3 months in and already not working. It wouldn't respond to swiping anymore. Cant even unlock it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Bought it "opened Box" like new, it was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upgrade my old SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab 10, but didn't like the new one nor the price, so I got this and it was like new, perfectly packaged with all the parts, not a scratch on it. Very happy to have saved so much and love the upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: TC55

customer_reviews.title: Better than an Apple tablet!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Ipad, I love this Galaxy S4 Tablet... I only use the Ipad as a backup device..
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: So much more!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my new device. It works so smooth and I find myself using it more and more. The Dex mode is really cool and I found myself using it more than I thought I would. The pen is sturdy and the tablet is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of $$$ and charger doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this through Amazon due to the pandemic. I hate buying Electronics through Amazon! When it finally came the charger does not work. I have another charger but the fact is to get Amazon to do anyting I have to send the whole thing back. So I'll just share household charger. Tell the additional $15 charger I have to buy from Amazon finally gets here. Not happy. When you spend that kind of money you expect things to work!
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet and it was worth the money. It is way cheaper on here then to but it in the store and works great. I use it for all of my school work because I take online classes. It is very convenient in its size and it also turns into Pc mode. I have a keyboard case that connects to my tablet as well to make typing easier. It’s very fast and works 10x better than my previous laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Gray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just a beautiful tablet in every way. The belt index feature is worth its price. Very pleased with his tablet
customer_reviews.author: Km

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: As far as tablets go, this is easily my best purchase. I'm a simple man, 10+" screen, memory card slot, small bezels and lots of internal memory makes me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: GREYVOICE

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet provides all functions excepted from Samsung. My only gripe would be the touch screen appears not to be a sensitive as older tablets. Video, sound quality and battery life are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped for. I use strictly for entertainment consumption, so don't count on my review if productivity is what you're wondering about... The screen is brilliant, the sound (paired with my FiiO headphone amplifier & Bose headphones) is loud and clear and I'm getting 6+ hours of screen on time with heavy usage. Unless it craps out unexpectedly, I should love this for years.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Well past due update.
customer_reviews.text: From the galaxy a to this is a marked improvement. 100% better. No review needed it is fantastic vs 7 yrs old technology.
customer_reviews.author: B.Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine for several months - Rating Based on Unexplained Product Failure
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for the few months I had been using it. Then suddenly, without warning, it simply wouldn't turn on. Not even using the manufacturer's suggested instructions, lots of testing, and countless online videos. Samsung, you let me down. I have sold my family on Samsung products over competitors; however, now I feel a bit sheepish. I'll never buy another electronic device without the insurance offered at check out. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: familymanforlife

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. It does so much for me. I got it for Chirstmas and could not be happier with it
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been a Samsung fan. I do not think I would have paid the 649.99 for it, but on prime days it was 499.99. Sold me on it. Great for that price as the S5e was 399.99 and not quite as powerful for gaming. But at 499.99 it was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Branning

customer_reviews.title: works well but clunky
customer_reviews.text: I particularly hate the case with the keyboard. Everything falls out and it is awkward to use. Otherwise if functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Tab S4 with S Pen
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy s4 replaced my small Tab a8 2016 model. Much improvement in size and performance. I love it. I'll end up keeping this tablet for a very long time until Tab s9 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Dolby Atmos not working
customer_reviews.text: Dolby Atmos is not enabled on my tablet. In settings it is grayed out. It cannot be turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Deej

customer_reviews.title: Quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my Galaxy Tab s2 to the Galaxy Tab s4 and dont regret it. The quality of the screen, the sound of speakers and the speed is noticeable. I love that it has quick charge and usb type c like my galaxy note 9. So I dont have to have different cables. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Sabat

customer_reviews.title: Great tab, a little harder to handle than the smaller tab
customer_reviews.text: Love everything speed, functionality, memory. A little heavier than expected. For just reading a book and movies are great but awkward holding to watch. I know just not as easy to handle as my previous tab. Went from smaller Samsung tab to this larger one. Wanted the speed and memory.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Darcy

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I use it all the time. Very clear screen. Very responsive. Really like the pen. I use it to draw quite a bit. Great battery life. I can go 9.5 hours before I need to think about recharging. And some apps allow me to hook up my wired switch controller (with a adaptor) to play games. Really like it
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: I personally think it is a very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my husband and he loves it. The sound is excellent. I couldn’t find anything that I didn’t like about it. We bought a case for it too.
customer_reviews.author: CSHA1

customer_reviews.title: My organizer
customer_reviews.text: I used this in conjunction with Evernote to be my mobile notebook and keep all my reference documents. This has been a great addition. I got this because they say you remember notes better if you wrote them, but I always misplace normal notebooks. This also helped me consolidate all my documents.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet - Happy Inbetween
customer_reviews.text: After a Couple of Months:: A Very Happy Inbetween. Between the Size of a Phone and a Laptop. Great for Showing off the Photos I Take, and Videos I Make. BlueTooth, Internet etc... I've got a 512GB sdCard I put in mine with Tons of Movies, Books, Photos, Music. Oh Yeah, a HeadPhone Jack made it a Deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy I purchased this tablet, and would highly recommend it to anyone in the market for a new tablet. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Frank P.

product_meta.title: Samsung Electronics SM-T830NZKLXAR Galaxy Tab S4 with S Pen, 10.5", Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:256 GB| Pattern Name:TabExplore, work and watch your favorite shows on a clear and stunningly brilliant screen. Transform your Galaxy Tab S4 into a PC experience with the taskbar you're used to with the revolutionary DeX*. Create a PowerPoint presentation and revise budgets in Excel at your favorite cafe. Then edit, sketch and capture inspiration with the included S Pen. And using far-field mics, you can even control your Tab S4 from a distance with Google Assistant. *DeX can be activated via Samsung Galaxy Tab S4 keyboard cover (SKU: EJ-FT830UBEGUJ) sold separately.
feature_bullets: DeX: Transform your tablet into a PC
S Pen included. Imagination unlocked; WiFi: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac 2.4G+5GHz. USB Type-C (3.1)
With far field mics, your tablet listens and responds to your voice when your tablet is out of reach
Super AMOLED Display. Crisp. Clear. Captivating
Cinematic Dolby Atmos Surround for truly cinematic surround sound

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars959 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
